title: Meal Share
description: This web application is a meal sharing platform for restaurants that allows users to discover, order, reserve seats, and request meals.

title: Movie App
description: This is a movie app that allows users to search for movies, view details, and get recommendations based on their preferences.

title: E-commerce Project
description: This is an e-commerce project that allows users to browse products, add them to a cart, and proceed to checkout.
